screenshots.caption: Preview Map with input search places autocomplete
Draggable marker map to update coordinates

name: Speed Street View
short_description: Get in an instant visualization of the streets with this extension dedicated to firefox. The application offers you the opportunity to search for places using advanced options: Establishments, Geocodes and Addresses. Finally you can have a preview of the geographical coordinates of the place you want to explore
summary: Get in an instant Street View using Google Maps API Javascript
